title: ‘I accept responsibility for the actions I take’ – President
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa says that he is well aware of the various hardship faced the masses and vowed to take tough decisions to find solutions to these issues.
He stated this while delivering his special address to the nation, which commenced a short while ago.

“Today I am addressing you at a challenging time. I am well aware about the shortage of goods essential for your day to day lives and the increase in prices. I am also well aware of the issues such as the gas shortage, fuel shortage and the power outages.”

The President said he is also sensitive to the various hardships the people of the country have had to face over the last two months. Although we did the best we could do with regard to that, I am aware that the situation still prevails due to reasons out of our grasp.

“I accept responsibility for the actions I take.” The President stated that he intends to take tough decisions to find solutions to some of the troublesome lifestyles that the people are experiencing.

Rajapaksa said he appointed a National Economic Council for this purpose as well as an advisory committee to assist them in that task while emphasizing that he will be constantly monitoring to see whether the decision taken by him are implemented.
